text: Isipi Kenani mopafima nemaniza vahera zamasamigahaze. Kagrama Ra Anumzamoka ama vahe amuno zamifima nemaninana, zamagra hago antahi'naze. Kagra Ra Anumzamoka zamufinti negagazagenka Kagra hamponu refite nezmantenka, Kagra Israeli vahe'mokizmi vugotezmantenka vimago hampompi nevunka, zagefina refite nezmantenka, hanimpina ana vimago hampompintira teve anefa hunka remsa huzmantenka nevane.
